title: Here is a list of 20 articles on multimodal entailment up to 2021. These articles cover various aspects of multimodal entailment, including methodologies, datasets, and applications
note: Note that some of these articles may also touch on related areas such as multimodal learning, visual question answering, and natural language processing.
